alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 03 at 3:50AM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow, moderate to heavy at times. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Very strong northeast winds gusting as high as 50 to 60 mph expected along much of the area. * WHERE...Western slopes of the Wind River Mountains. * WHEN...Now until 6 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel over South Pass will become impossible later this afternoon and evening. A prolonged road closure of Highway 28 including South Pass is likely. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strong winds will result in considerable blowing and drifting of snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
